name: Swedish Nuts I
author: bsheehan
summary: These are delicious. My friends all now eagerly expect them for Christmas. They are perfect for holiday gifts!
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Place nuts on a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan, and bake for 10 minutes
Remove nuts, and melt butter on pan
In a medium bowl, beat egg whites until soft peaks form
Gradually beat in the sugar and salt
Fold toasted nuts into egg white mixture
Arrange the coated nuts in a single layer on the buttered pan
Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, turning nuts with spatula every 10 minutes, until outside is crisp and golden
Cool, and store in an airtight container
